divs: sighting detailscoming home from work east on michigan ave. in canton @ approx. 2a on 2\10\11 i turned onto haggerty off michigan ave & saw a low flying craft gliding across the i-275 expressway more slowly than normal aircraft in a southwesterly arc & watched it as it flew directly over my car, trying to discern whether it had wings. there were none, instead i made out a triangular shape, & there were large white lights @ each corner & a smaller red light @ tne bottom of the triangle just in front of the two lights in back. the craft was huge. i drove on trying to make sense of what i'd just seen. the next morning (2\11\11)@ approximately 3a as i approached the same intersection, i noticed 3 lights side by side drifting downward at a angle over michigan ave. approx. a mile in front of me. i thought it was a plane @ 1st, but because of the sighting the previous a.m., i focused on it as it moved toward the tree line running along mich.ave. the closer i got the more i realized it wasn't advancing, but stationary, which really struck me. it was hovering above the trees directly across from a large gas station which was brightly lit. it was just @ the n.w. corner of michigan ave. & haggerty. it was huge, i'm guessing close to 150 feet long, one light in front, two in back. as i was the only car on the road for a few minutes, i was able to drive by slowly & stare @ the craft for roughly half a minute, awestruck, even mildly stunned. it just sat there in the air about 100 feet above the trees, which showed no sign of movement, no disruption as if by downward air pressure for example. as i made the turn to go north on haggerty toward home, it took off on a straight trajectory following the tree line so smoothly i took note of that fact, as it indicated no impetus, no jerkiness or sign of propulsion. on both occasions,the craft made absolutely no sound. just after making the turn onto haggerty i decided to turn back & follow it. but by the time i got back onto michigan ave. west it was gone. then on 3\14\11, having been watching the skies in the area more closely than before, & i've been watching most of my life, i caught sight of the three side by side lights as i drove west to ypsilanti on my way to work @ approx. 9:30p just to my left from the i-94 expressway & kept looking back & forth watching the road & looking toward the craft hovering over ford lake. as i got off the freeway, i looked back to see it moving eastward, then lost sight of it, as i accessed the road to work.
Summary: hovered over trees @ intersection & more-see details below
